scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm ci --omit=dev --no-audit && cd ../frontend && npm ci --no-audit
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run postinstall && npm run build
scripts.clean: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run postinstall
